text.div:
Meningococcal Disease (Tests for Neisseria meningitidis by Culture and Identification Method)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    16134-9 Neisseria meningitidis [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
    42368-1 Neisseria meningitidis serogroup w135 Ag [Presence] in Isolate by Agglutination
    42369-9 Neisseria meningitidis serogroup A Ag [Presence] in Isolate by Agglutination
    42370-7 Neisseria meningitidis serogroup B Ag [Presence] in Isolate by Agglutination
    42371-5 Neisseria meningitidis serogroup C Ag [Presence] in Isolate by Agglutination
    42372-3 Neisseria meningitidis serogroup D Ag [Presence] in Isolate by Agglutination
    42373-1 Neisseria meningitidis serogroup X Ag [Presence] in Isolate by Agglutination
    42374-9 Neisseria meningitidis serogroup Y Ag [Presence] in Isolate by Agglutination
    42375-6 Neisseria meningitidis serogroup Z Ag [Presence] in Isolate by Agglutination
    42376-4 Neisseria meningitidis serogroup Z' Ag [Presence] in Isolate by Agglutination
    44093-3 Neisseria meningitidis [Identifier] in Isolate by Organism specific culture
    45183-1 Neisseria meningitidis [Identifier] in Isolate by Agglutination
    70172-2 Neisseria meningitidis serogroup [Identifier] in Unspecified specimen
    73702-3 Neisseria meningitidis serosubtype [Type] in Isolate by Immunoassay
    85779-7 Neisseria meningitidis DNA [Presence] by NAA with non-probe detection in Positive blood culture
    86581-6 Neisseria meningitidis [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Organism specific culture
    87958-5 Neisseria meningitidis [Presence] in Throat by Organism specific culture
    91788-0 Neisseria meningitidis [Presence] in Upper respiratory specimen by Organism specific culture
